statements: SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, company_name FROM audits WHERE audit_id = 100;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, company_name FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY audit_date DESC, auditor_name ASC
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, company_name FROM audits WHERE audit_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT company_name, audit_date FROM audits WHERE auditor_name LIKE 'J%' AND compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company' AND audit_date > '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT MAX(audit_id) AS max_audit_id FROM audits
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT audit_date, audit_findings FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_findings IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM regulatory_audits WHERE auditor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inspections ORDER BY inspector_name, inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM audits
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE inspection_id = 1
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant'
SELECT company_name, compliance_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY compliance_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed';
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_report FROM inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT inspection_id, location, inspection_date FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT finding_id, finding_description, compliance_status FROM findings WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT action_id, action_description, completion_date FROM corrective_actions WHERE action_description ILIKE '%safety%';
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT finding_id, finding_description, compliance_status FROM findings WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT violation_type, penalty_amount FROM violations WHERE penalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY penalty_amount ASC;
SELECT action_id, action_description, completion_date FROM corrective_actions WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audits LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, compliance_level FROM audits WHERE compliance_level > 80;
SELECT * FROM findings ORDER BY finding_id DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, compliance_status FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM findings WHERE finding_id > 100 AND finding_id < 200
SELECT findings.finding_description, audits.auditor_name FROM findings JOIN audits ON findings.audit_id = audits.audit_id
SELECT * FROM audit_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY report_date ASC
